content.question: A jogger runs along a straight track. The jogger’s position is given by the function <math alttext="p of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></math> is measured in minutes since the start of the run. During the first minute of the run, the jogger’s acceleration is proportional to the square root of the time since the start of the run. Which of the following is a differential equation that describes this relationship, where <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></math> is a positive constant?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of p, with respect to t, equals, k times the square root of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of p, with respect to t, equals, k times the square root of p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the second derivative of p, with respect to t, equals, k times the square root of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the second derivative of p, with respect to t, equals, k times the square root of p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the second derivative of p, with respect to t, equals, k times the square root of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
